history.content:
3D Modeling and Animation Info Session + Movie Night next Friday!
Animation Industry speaker events? Resume and Portfolio workshops? Need some peer pressure to finish that short? If any of this sounds interesting, join 3D Modeling and Animation!

Come to our info session + movie night on Friday, February 11th, 8-10 pm PST, in Wheeler 204 to learn more.

We are a student organization dedicated to the education, research, and creation of 3D Modeling and Animation. Our goal is to create a supportive community at Berkeley for students who are passionate about learning, creating, and pursuing graphics. Each semester we host educational workshops, invite industry professionals to give demos, and organize social events to help students pursue their career and goals. We also run a semester-long DeCal called UCBUGG: 3D Modeling & Animation that teaches students the entire animation pipeline and helps them to produce a short animated film.

Fill out the 3DMA Interest Form and let us know what you expect from us: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSehYLnBljeXeDL64rFr4RJqh6MyaSP81upYNAqHEDmuzIdnsg/viewform
